actions.name: Changelog for all
actions.description: Generates a changelog for all repositories by loading source JSON, extracting commit information, and formatting it into a structured HTML document. It uploads the changelog as an artifact and creates a release on GitHub with the generated content. The process includes fetching commit data, processing it, and ensuring the latest version information is included.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 0:00, on MON

actions.name: Clean repository
actions.description: Cleans the repository by generating a JSON configuration based on supported releases and desktop environments from the Armbian build framework. It checks out the framework repository and processes configuration files to create a structured JSON output for further use in the workflow.

actions.name: Build All Stable Artifacts (cronjob)
actions.description: Builds and prepares stable artifacts and images for deployment, including version management and artifact generation. It checks for existing artifacts, bumps versions if necessary, and uploads the results for further processing. The workflow also generates JSON matrices for various build configurations and manages dependencies across multiple repositories.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 1:00

actions.name: Build All Artifacts (cronjob)
actions.description: Builds and prepares artifacts and images for multiple targets, managing versioning and generating necessary metadata. It includes steps for checking team membership, bumping versions, and preparing JSON matrices for artifacts and images. The workflow also handles Docker image builds and uploads artifacts for later use.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, every 8 hours

actions.name: Build Apps Images (cronjob)
actions.description: Builds application images and manages versioning for software artifacts. Prepares a matrix of builds based on various input parameters, including branch, board type, and maintainer. Handles version bumping and artifact uploads, while also checking for existing OCI artifacts if specified.

actions.name: Build Community Images (cronjob)
actions.description: Builds community images and manages versioning for Armbian projects. Prepares artifacts and images based on specified parameters, including nightly and stable builds. Generates release notes and uploads artifacts for distribution.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 9:00, on THU

actions.name: Build Nightly Images (cronjob)
actions.description: Builds nightly images and manages versioning for artifacts. Prepares a JSON matrix for artifact and image builds, checks team membership, and handles version bumps. Generates release notes and uploads artifacts for download.
actions.cron_schedule: at 00 minutes past the hour, at 8:00

actions.name: Build Standard Support Images (admin)
actions.description: Builds standard support images for various boards and frameworks, managing versioning and artifact generation. It includes steps for checking team membership, bumping versions, and preparing a JSON matrix for builds. The workflow also handles user patches and manages dependencies through Docker.

actions.name: Build One by One (anyone)
actions.description: Builds Armbian images for various target boards and configurations based on user inputs. Allows selection of kernel branch, userspace, user interface, and specific board types. Utilizes a predefined build action to compile and package the images.

actions.name: Delete Old Releases
actions.description: Deletes old releases from the repository by identifying and removing both full and pre-releases that exceed a specified limit. It processes releases based on their creation date and removes the oldest ones, ensuring only the most recent releases are retained.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 3:00

actions.name: Download update (admin)
actions.description: Downloads updates from a specified source and synchronizes them to designated servers. Checks membership for authorization, retrieves server details, and performs file synchronization using rsync. Optionally purges incoming files based on user input and refreshes web and redirector indices after synchronization.

actions.name: Enable Hetzner Runners (admin)
actions.description: Enables and disables Hetzner cloud runners based on specified configurations, including machine type and count. Cleans up any existing dangling runners before enabling new ones, and allows for a configurable sleep period between enabling and disabling the runners. Checks team membership before proceeding with operations.
actions.cron_schedule: at 10 minutes past the hour, at 8:00

actions.name: Verify installation (pull request)
actions.description: Verifies installation by downloading and testing external configurations from specified paths. Cancels any currently active workflows if conditions are met, ensuring only the latest workflow runs. Utilizes external scripts for the download and test process.
actions.execution_method: pull_request (opened, reopened, edited, synchronize, review_requested), workflow_dispatch

actions.name: Full distro test builds
actions.description: Builds and tests Armbian distribution images for various desktop environments. Prepares the build environment, checks out necessary repositories, and compiles images based on specified configurations. Outputs a JSON structure detailing the supported releases and desktop environments for further processing.
actions.cron_schedule: at 00 minutes past the hour, at 5:00

actions.name: Labeler (pull request)
actions.description: Adds labels to pull requests based on modified files to facilitate organization and triage. Utilizes the 'actions/labeler' action to determine which labels to apply according to the defined rules.

actions.name: Set PR and issues labels from yaml
actions.description: Sets labels for pull requests and issues based on a YAML configuration file. It reads label definitions from '.github/labels.yml' and applies them accordingly, allowing for a dry-run mode during pull requests. The process ensures that only specified labels are applied, excluding those that match certain patterns.
actions.execution_method: workflow_dispatch, push to main branch, pull_request

actions.name: Upload live patch script
actions.description: Uploads live patch scripts by checking team membership, signing scripts with GPG, and transferring them to a remote server. It ensures that only authorized team members can perform the upload and that the scripts are properly signed before deployment. The workflow also creates a web-friendly version of each script for accessibility.

actions.name: Recreate Matrix (push)
actions.description: Recreates action for building stable images by checking out necessary repositories, syncing user patches, generating build lists, and creating action scripts for various Armbian configurations. It prepares YAML files for different build targets and configurations based on the latest updates and user inputs. This process ensures that the builds are up-to-date and correctly configured for various boards and releases.
actions.cron_schedule: at 00 minutes past the hour, at 5:00

actions.name: Redirector update (cronjob)
actions.description: Checks and verifies the status of various mirrors for debs, debs-beta, archive, and images, generating corresponding YAML configurations for a redirector. It retrieves data from a database, performs checks on server responses, and uploads the results as artifacts. The workflow also includes membership checks and scheduled executions for regular updates.
actions.cron_schedule: at 00 minutes past the hour, at 8:00

actions.name: Repository Index sync (auto)
actions.description: Synchronizes files across stable servers and updates the web index for a repository. Retrieves primary mirror details from a database and conditionally syncs files based on their last modified date or a forced sync input. Utilizes SSH for secure file transfer and manages multiple servers in parallel.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, every 4 hours

actions.name: Repository update (admin)
actions.description: Updates the repository by downloading external resources, building packages, and synchronizing files across servers. It also manages GPG keys, cleans up old packages, and can optionally include partial updates based on input parameters. Finally, it refreshes the web and redirector index for the repository.

actions.name: Smoke tests (cronjob)
actions.description: Runs various tests with the latest nightly codebase on real hardware, ensuring the integrity and performance of the software. It checks team membership before executing the smoke tests to validate the codebase under specified conditions.
actions.execution_method: schedule, workflow_dispatch with inputs (gitbranch, powermanagement, betaonly), repository_dispatch
actions.cron_schedule: at 30 minutes past the hour, at 5:00

actions.name: TEST TEST TEST
actions.description: Runs scheduled and manual tests, allowing for additional parameters and repository references. Prepares incoming data for deployment by mirroring to a CDN. Utilizes environment variables for repository management and build configurations.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, every 8 hours

actions.name: Watchdog (cronjob)
actions.description: Reruns failed jobs for specified scripts in a GitHub repository by checking the status of previous workflow runs. It attempts to restart workflows up to six times if they fail or are cancelled. This process ensures that builds and tests are consistently executed, improving reliability and stability of the CI/CD pipeline.

actions.name: Generate Download Index in JSON (admin)
actions.description: Generates a JSON index of downloadable files by checking membership, installing dependencies, and aggregating data from various repositories. It creates a map of stable files, builds a comprehensive JSON file with asset details, and uploads the generated index along with torrent files to a specified server. The process includes cleaning up temporary files and managing SSH keys for secure access.
